revisionDesc.change: removed duplicate reg encoding within choice
Replace internal notes with external notes
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent changes as necessary
Review oral proofreading corrections; add RMBucke Hand note and date note; revise paragraphing
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i have been looking for a letter all day but none came so it is saturday Saturday night and i am alone for A wonder so i thought i would write you a few lines although my paper is somewha somewhat soiled and rather scanty it will let you see we are all in the land of the living i have better paper than this but it is away up stairs and i am too tired to go for it) we have had a terrible murder here as i suppose you see by the papers all spaniards together) well georgee
dident didn't get the job of the big house after spending so much time he says he aint ain't much dissappointed disappointed as the architect was in favor of the new york bosses perhaps its it's all for the best it would have been a great care and worriment of mind they will get the job done they are at about chrismas Christmas George says) probably something will turn up by that time i tell him to go and see his friends and take things easey easy i have not had one word from hanna since i came home i want to hear from her very much i often wish i could see her i got thinking about her and other things night before last and i could not get to sleep till most morning
then you know i get up very early most generally a little before day light i dont don't mind so much after i get down stairs but its something of job for me to get down some mornings i have been very lame more so than usuallusual) i have got a union with an article about your book i told Jeff to take it and send it to you would you like to have it or dont don't you care about it) it is not so severe as the one in the nation of the 16th of novemberNovember tom Rome left it here for me to read he is quite put out about it

i should like for mr OconnerO'Connor to see that in the nation it is a long piece with flourishes) the one in the union made me laughflaugh you got my letter dident didn't you Walt i wrote last sunday Sunday and finished monday Monday about Cornelius s Cornelius's death Jeff and matty and the children are very well indeed martha has a woman to come every day and doo do up her work little jimmy comes as usual no more to night with my awful pen
